isis.stitle: 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14613 - REASSEMBLE - AUXILIARY DRIVE GEAR ASSEMBLY

step1.para: If previously removed, install the O-rings on the extended front hub of the front auxiliary drive gear ( Figure 183).

figure.caption: Figure 183. Install O-Rings on Extended Front Hub of Front Auxiliary Drive Gear

step1.para: Install the retainer ring on the front auxiliary drive gear, snap ring groove facing the front hub and away from the gear teeth ( Figure 184).

figure.caption: Figure 184. Install Retainer Ring on Front Auxiliary Drive Gear

step1.para: Start the front auxiliary drive gear bearing on the front hub, bearing snap ring facing the groove in the retainer ring ( Figure 185). Using both hands, press the bearing on the gear with the snap ring in the groove of the retainer ring (inset).

figure.caption: Figure 185. Start Front Auxiliary Drive Gear Bearing on Front Hub

step1.para: Install the snap ring in the groove of the front gear hub to retain the bearing ( Figure 186).

figure.caption: Figure 186. Install Snap Ring in Groove of Front Gear Hub
